LIC Jeevan Pragati Plan is non linked market traditional plan launched by LIC.LIC launched this plan on 03rd Feb,2016.The major benefit of this plan is its increasing Insurance cover by time to time.

Main Feature of the plan is Low Premium with High Risk Coverage:
Minimum Entry Age : 12 Years 
Maximum Entry Age : 45 Year 
Minimum Policy Term : 12 Years 
Maximum Policy Term : 20 Years 
Maturity Benefit : Basic Sum Assured + Bonuses + Final Additional Bonuses ( FAB ), if any. 
Death Benefit : The Sum Assured on Death Automatically Increases every five years ... 
During the 1st to 5th Policy Years - 100% of the Basic Sum Assured 
During the 6th to 10th Policy Years - 125% of the Basic Sum Assured 
During the 11th to 15th Policy Years - 150% of the Basic Sum Assured 
During the 16th to 20th Policy Years - 200% of the Basic Sum Assured.

This Plan is a Complete Protection for your 
1) Housing Loan 
2) Credit Cards Loans 
3) Jewel Loans 
4) all other Personal Loans No need of worry , If anything uncertian happens for the Policy Holder.
Nominee are safe from all financial debts or Loans Death Accidental Benefit - 100% Extra of the Basic Sum Assured For More details call or sms.
